45.eng-name: Chapters on The Virtues of the Qur'an
45.ara-name: كتاب ثواب القرآن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Whoever recites Ha Mim Al-Mu'min - up to - To Him is the return (40:1-3) and Ayat Al-Kursi when he reaches (gets up in) the morning, he will be protected by them until the evening. And whoever recites them when he reaches the evening, he will be protected by them until the morning

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ سُورَةِ الْبَقَرَةِ وَآيَةِ الْكُرْسِيِّ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Surat Al-Baqarah and Ayat Al-Kursi
